TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
5 minutes ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:

I wish that I had a 450 pound hamster.

Granted.
You join a bodybuilding club and feed your hamster with remains of your special nutrition.
A year later you have a 450 pound hamster.

I wish Greenpeace won't know about that.

5 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted.
You join a bodybuilding club and feed your hamster with remains of your special nutrition.
A year later you have a 450 pound hamster.

I wish Greenpeace won't know about that.

They don't, but then the hippies catch hold of it.

I wish they would give me my hamster back.

1 minute ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:

I wish they would give me my hamster back.

Overgranted. They give you the whole hamster, including its back.

I wish your hamster could speak.

The hamster not only speaks, it sings, too... but only Bette Midler songs.

i wish I had green eggs and ham.

Granted, you have a colony of Aspergillus bacteria growing on plate of eggs and ham. After consuming the ham and eggs, you get a particularly bad case of Pulmonary Hemorrhage.

I wish for a +3 magic longsword.

Granted, you get a longsword with 3t magic, but 3t isn't a number.

I wish for a meme.

Your generic forum avatar becomes a meme, and people end up defacing and drawing stuff like anime on the kerbal silhouette.

I wish my hamster would sing AC/DC.

He does, horribly... all night long. (there's a reference there, kids)

I wish I understood musical theory.

Granted, you wish is meaningless.

I wish fandoms would stop.

Edited February 5, 2018 by TheKSPBeginner

The KSP forum has shut down due to lack of fans. You should've asked Al Gore first.

I wish the world was back in one piece and the billions who were slaughtered in the previous questions revived as non zombie human.

Edited February 7, 2018 by TheMadKraken2297

Granted. Restore is in progress. Please wait...

I wish the backup were not corrupted.

Granteed. The backup is just fine, but is incompatible with the current version of the universe.

I wish for sandwich.

The sandwich has no fillings.

I wish to sleep peacefully tonight.

You wake up an notice a bottle of chloroform and an old rag on your night stand.

I wish I had guacamole.

Granted, you now used to have guacamole.

I wish I still had the guacamole

Granted.

I wish Firefox were the default browser everywhere.

Granted. Now everyone uses a flaming Fox's paw on their mouse to manipulate Internet Explorer.

I wish my hamster could sing GOOD AC/DC.

Granted. It's the same as before. Someone wanders by and compliments the hamster.

I wish for some solder wick.

Granted. It's conductive wax and your soldering iron catches it on fire, ruining your project.

I wish my KSP wasn't sitting uninstalled on the steam cloud.

Your steam got hacked and KSP now sits on somebody else's hard drive and they are having fun with it.

I wish I had spider senses.

Granted. You now have spider's senses. It came with the 2 cm body, 8 legs, and a brain to small to write on the forums. You are now a spider.

I wish that all spiders were teleported to Alpha Centauri B's core.

granted, but so was the planet.

I wish I could have bought that gently used falcon 9 on craigslist
Being Craigslist, gently used meant drained of fuel and burned slightly during re entry. Previous tenants clean.
I wish for a million trucks

We mistake your wish for a million bucks, you're now rich. Oops!

I wish for a white pony with rainbow tail and hair, with the apple Mac loading swirl thing, named eternity.
